reviewText:
If you're a fan of brain-teasing puzzle games this one could take your liking, i want to start by saying the English in this game isn't exactly the best i've ever seen, but that doesn't stop it being a testing game.

The story & meaning behind the game is very difficult to follow however, each room supposedly having meaning to the story yet most of them don't seem to make sense. However the puzzles in this game aren't the hardest ever, but there's definitely a few in here that keep you interested and determined to get through the game.

I do recommend this game if you're a fan of brain-teasers, just don't expect the storyline to make a lot of sense as so far i'm finding it difficult to piece together and follow. Will come back to this if it makes any sense at any point.

Ultimately for Â£3.99 you can't really ask for more..

reviewText: Constantly crashes, the English is so broken it's almost impossible to understand, and the puzzles are downright confusing. Not recommended.
